actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Telecommunications and Finance.

official_title: To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit commerce in high-definition televisions that do not contain minimum levels of domestic content.

summary.text: High Definition Television Act of 1990 - Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit the shipment in interstate commerce, or the importation into the United States for resale to the public, of any high-definition television receiver unless it complies with specified domestic content ratios.

titles.title: To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit commerce in high-definition televisions that do not contain minimum levels of domestic content.
